name: Chapter 8: Under Pressure
short_description: As the team works under tight deadlines, internal and external pressures mount. A rogue faction of Codarians opposes the alliance, causing disruptions. The team must deal with these threats while staying on course.
people: Captain Picard, Commander Riker, Data, Codarian leaders, rogue Codarians
from_prev_chapter: The plan is set in motion, and the team begins the complex task.
to_next_chapter: Despite setbacks, progress is made, but the team realizes they'll need to accelerate their efforts to succeed.
